Description: Fragment of limestone monumental Greek inscription. Front and rear surfaces preserved; the latter is stippled with a raised band, 3 cm high.
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1092)
Höckmann & Möller 2006 / The Hellenion at Naukratis: Questions and Observations (p.16, no.71)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXI, no.7)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 23)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.25)
